data.actual_result: You can actually speak because mic icon is active. But no one can hear you because you are actually muted and the other user's microphone is active too.
data.short_description: You can talk in an AFK channel, even that it is not supposed to be
data.steps_to_repro: - Be sure that your microphone is not crossed out or turned off. - Go to an AFK channel. Make sure that the channel is only have muted user channel. - Try to speak - Observe
